description: Calendar date the fueling event occurred for the asset.
Unique identifier of the vehicle or equipment that received the fuel.
Code identifying the fuel stock source or product (e.g., tank or location). Likely an inventory or product code; confirm with SME.
Volume of fuel dispensed in the transaction; unit depends on configuration (e.g., gallons or liters).
Unit price of the fuel for this transaction. Confirm whether this is per unit or total if unclear.
Asset meter reading captured at the time of fueling (odometer miles/km or engine hours). Used for usage tracking and maintenance.
Identifier of the driver or operator associated with the fueling event.
Account or cost center charged for the fuel expense.
User-defined custom field for additional fueling attributes. Purpose set by the business; confirm with SME.
User-defined custom field for additional fueling attributes. Purpose set by the business; confirm with SME.
User-defined custom field for additional fueling attributes. Purpose set by the business; confirm with SME.
User-defined custom field for additional fueling attributes. Purpose set by the business; confirm with SME.
User-defined custom field for additional fueling attributes. Purpose set by the business; confirm with SME.
User-defined custom field for additional fueling attributes. Purpose set by the business; confirm with SME.
Free-text notes or miscellaneous details for the fuel transaction.
User ID that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created (system time).
User ID that last updated the record.
Timestamp when the record was last updated (system time).
Type or classification of the asset fueled (e.g., vehicle, trailer, equipment); used for reporting and rules.
